subject: College Athletics
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The junior striker Terrence Johnson scored two goals and had an assist as the Stevens Institute of Technology defeated Amherst College, 4-1, in the semifinals of the Division III men’s championship in Greensboro, N.C. Stevens (19-2-4) will play Messiah College (21-2-2) for the national title on Saturday; Messiah defeated Loras College, 3-0.
